oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Location from the film "Wild River"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The other location for "Garth Island" on the peninsula where the Hiwassee River joins the Tennessee River. Chickamauga Lake is seen in the background. For the movie "Wild River," 1959.
This was pastureland, the tenant house row was emplaced and outfitted, complete with a vat for rendering rye, in two weeks.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: RG 82: Tennessee Department of Conservation Photograph Collection, 1937-1976
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Motion pictures; Lakes & ponds; Dwellings; Studio props
